description: Ministry of Telecommunication and Information Technology. - Order to appoint the 23.10.2013 as the date on which the provisions of Sec. 18 and Sec. 20(1) of Electronic Transactions Act No. 19 of 2006, comes into operation - Order to designate the Information and Communication Technology Agency of Sri Lanka (ICTA) as the Certification Authority for the purposes of Act No. 19 of 2006
